Dustbunnies are used to modify the appearance of a table.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
Dustbunnies <- read.csv(system.file("dustbunnies.csv", package = "dustpan"),
                        stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(dustpan)
dust(Dustbunnies) + 
  dust_print_method(print_method = "html")
```
